name: BEACON (itch) (Rustforms)
description:
You are the sole pilot of Research Pod 43b, which crash landed in an abandoned settlement, and your power is running low.

Use the arrow keys to rotate your pod, and click to grapple onto beacons to propel you forward. You can only make 16 grapples before your pod runs out of power. Use your momentum to fling the research pod towards the communication tower in order to send out a signal so that you can be found.
